Ampoule Pod.name: Ampoule Pod
Ampoule Pod.text: Common growing in swamps in the Bitter Coast region; one of two possible outputs of the draggle-tail plant (the other is the Coda Flower)

Ash Yam.name: Ash Yam
Ash Yam.text: Most common in farm areas, occasionally found in the wild

Bittergreen Petals.name: Bittergreen Petals
Bittergreen Petals.text: Grows on thorny vines in drier regions

Black Anther.name: Black Anther
Black Anther.text: These flowers are most common in the Ascadian Isles region

Black Lichen.name: Black Lichen
Black Lichen.text: Somewhat rare, mostly found in caves

Bloat.name: Bloat
Bloat.text: Grows in Bloat Spores, which are unfortunately not found anywhere in the game. The only examples you can find are in random containers, or sold by vendors.

Bonemeal.name: Bonemeal
Bonemeal.text: Found on skeletons (living or dead), and also in urns in most tombs.

Bread.name: Bread
Bread.text: Found in most taverns and many houses.

Bungler's Bane.name: Bungler's Bane
Bungler's Bane.text: This shelf-fungus grows on tree trunks in the Bitter Coast region

Coda Flower.name: Coda Flower
Coda Flower.text: Found growing in swampy pools in the Bitter Coast region on the draggle-tail plant

Comberry.name: Comberry
Comberry.text: Grows in shrubs in the West Gash and Ascadian Isles regions

Corkbulb Root.name: Corkbulb Root
Corkbulb Root.text: Mostly found in drier regions in the wild.

Daedra Skin.name: Daedra Skin
Daedra Skin.text: Somewhat rare, mostly found at vendors

Daedra's Heart.name: Daedra's Heart
Daedra's Heart.text: Found by killing most Daedra - Dremora, Ogrim, Clannfears, Daedroth, etc.

Diamond.name: Diamond
Diamond.text: Common in barrels in Dwemer ruins. Also found in a small number of caves

Emerald.name: Emerald
Emerald.text: Common in barrels in Dwemer ruins

Fire Petal.name: Fire Petal
Fire Petal.text: Found growing in the Molag Amur and Red Mountain regions

Ghoul Heart.name: Ghoul Heart
Ghoul Heart.text: Supposedly the heart tissue of an Ash Ghoul, but not found on them. Mostly in random ingredient containers and sold at vendors.

Gold Kanet.name: Gold Kanet
Gold Kanet.text: Found growing in bushes in the grassy regions

Gravedust.name: Gravedust
Gravedust.text: No reliable location. Occasionally for sale at vendors or found in random containers

Green Lichen.name: Green Lichen
Green Lichen.text: Mostly grows on rocks in caves

Hackle-Lo Leaf.name: Hackle-Lo Leaf
Hackle-Lo Leaf.text: Found as food in most houses; grows wild in the Azura's Coast region.

Heather.name: Heather
Heather.text: This common flower grows throughout the greener regions of Vvardenfell.

Hypha Facia.name: Hypha Facia
Hypha Facia.text: This shelf-fungus is found growing on tree trunks in the Bitter Coast region

Kresh Fiber.name: Kresh Fiber
Kresh Fiber.text: Kreshweed is found growing near sea water, most common in the Azura's Coast, Bitter Coast and West Gash regions.

Large Kwama Egg.name: Large Kwama Egg
Large Kwama Egg.text: Found in Egg Mines. Also common as food in houses.

Luminous Russula.name: Luminous Russula
Luminous Russula.text: Found in the Bitter Coast region, also common in caves

Marshmerrow.name: Marshmerrow
Marshmerrow.text: Found growing near water, most common in the Azura's Coast region

Moon Sugar.name: Moon Sugar
Moon Sugar.text: Found in smuggler caves. Most vendors will not deal with you if you are carrying this illegal narcotic substance.

Muck.name: Muck
Muck.text: Found on Muck Sponges which grow near water in many regions

Pearl.name: Pearl
Pearl.text: Found in kollops on the sea floor. Also found in barrels in Dwemer ruins.

Raw Ebony.name: Raw Ebony
Raw Ebony.text: Found in Ebony Mines. Usually a crime to take it.

Raw Glass.name: Raw Glass
Raw Glass.text: Found in Glass Mines. Usually a crime to take it.

Red Lichen.name: Red Lichen
Red Lichen.text: Found growing on rocks, mostly in the Ashlands. Also for sale at vendors.

Resin.name: Resin
Resin.text: No reliable location. Occasionally for sale at vendors or found in random containers.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.text: Often found in barrels in Dwemer ruins

Saltrice.name: Saltrice
Saltrice.text: Found growing near sea water, most common in the Azura's Coast region. Also a common food item in houses.

Scrap Metal.name: Scrap Metal
Scrap Metal.text: Found by killing Dwemer constructs. Also common in barrels and on shelves in Dwemer ruins.

Scrib Jerky.name: Scrib Jerky
Scrib Jerky.text: Found as a food item in houses.

Scuttle.name: Scuttle
Scuttle.text: Found as a food item in houses.

Sload Soap.name: Sload Soap
Sload Soap.text: Rare. Mostly found for sale at vendors or in random containers.

Small Kwama Egg.name: Small Kwama Egg
Small Kwama Egg.text: Found in Egg Mines. Also common food item in houses.

Spore Pod.name: Spore Pod
Spore Pod.text: Found on Slough Ferns growing in the Bitter Coast region

Stoneflower Petals.name: Stoneflower Petals
Stoneflower Petals.text: These flowers are common in the West Gash and Ascadian Isles regions.

Trama Root.name: Trama Root
Trama Root.text: Found growing in dry, hilly regions

Violet Coprinus.name: Violet Coprinus
Violet Coprinus.text: These mushrooms grow throughout the Bitter Coast region, and are also common in caves.

Void Salts.name: Void Salts
Void Salts.text: Found by killing Storm Atronachs or Winged Twilights

Wickwheat.name: Wickwheat
Wickwheat.text: Found growing in the Grazelands region

Willow Anther.name: Willow Anther
Willow Anther.text: Most common in the Ascadian Isles region
